title: Bug 110566: Wrong result returned when setting an invalid filter expression row[0]
description: When setting a filter like 'row[0] equals to 0' or just returning a null result set, the data set returns incorrect results. The expected behavior is that an error message should appear when an invalid filter expression is set.
OB: Bug 110566: Wrong result returned when setting an invalid filter expression row[0]. The steps to reproduce the issue are as follows: 1. Set a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to ' 2. Click on the Preview tab. The actual result is that the first result record is returned when previewing the data set.
EB: An error message should appear when setting an invalid filter expression like 'row[0] equals to '.
SR: 1. Open the data set. 2. Set the filter expression to 'row[0] equals to '. 3. Click on the Preview tab.
